programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Just for Kicks. The Wicked Witch decides she needs an army to replace the one that she lost and sets her sights on the all-female all-dancing army of General Jinjur. She lures the overworked and over-danced army of Jinjur away from her and has plans to turn their kicks destructive. Jinjur goes to Dorothy for help. They team up to create a new army to get the Witch's one away from her, but the only people they're able to recruit are Woozy and his friends. They're going to have to whip Woozy and the other animals into shape if they stand a chance of defeating the Witch's karate-kicking army.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: North Meets West. With the Wicked Witch becoming more of a threat, Dorothy, Glinda, and the gang go to Tattypoo, the retired Good Witch of the North to see if she'll come out of retirement to help them fight against the Wicked Witch of the West and her silver slippers. Just as Tattypoo is about to agree, the Wicked Witch strikes and erases her memory, putting her out of commission. The Wicked Witch has a plan to trick the amnesiac Tattypoo into believing that she was an evil witch just like her before she lost her memory. It's up to Dorothy and friends to retrieve enough mementos from Tattypoo's past to help her remember who she really was.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York II
programme.desc: Hold on to your hats, New York! Legendary Cat & Mouse Tom and Jerry are headed to New York City, where Tom is the resident mouser at the 5-star Royal Gate Hotel – and Jerry is the up-to-no-good resident mouse. Join Tom, Jerry, Spike the bulldog, Butch the alley cat, and all of their fun, fuzzy friends as they explore the Big Apple’s world-famous landmarks, subways, and back alleys. Accompanied by a selection of original songs, our beloved characters show off their fancy, furry footwork in fun-filled action that never let’s up. Check-in at the Royal Gate Hotel and then check out the all-new Tom and Jerry in New York!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: For the Love of Ruggles. Tom impulsively kicks Spike's beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence and has to go get it back when he sees how heartbroken Spike becomes. Things get hard when Ruggles is adopted by an imaginative little girl Matalyn and Tom has to steal him back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Sleuth or Consequences. Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing all their customers by using high-tech devices to solve crimes. Tom and Jerry challenge them to a competition to solve one final case: either find a goldfish's missing gold chest or close up shop. Something isn't quite right about the Cat and Squirrel Detective agency though..

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Superfied. Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and they have fun terrorizing Tom an alley cat who has broken in to eat them. The tables are turned when Tom gets his hands on the cookies.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hop to It! Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown. Tom sees Princess Toodles and quickly forgets the mission. He competes with Butch in three trials to win over Toodles. Jerry struggles to keep them on track and to help Tom out with the competition.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Smitten with the Kitten. Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Guardians of the Gates of Yawn. The Wicked Witch follows a clue on the silver slippers to Emerald City Clock Tower, putting all the guards in her way to sleep with a very powerful potion. But she gets more than she bargained for when she accidentally sets off every single alarm clock in the whole place and awakens the Quox, a giant silver beast slumbering beneath Emerald City! While Dorothy and friends are preoccupied with trying to deal with that thing, the witches dive deep into the tunnel the Quox came from for signs of the silver slippers. Dorothy and friends figure out the only way to deal with the beast is to put it back to sleep. And the only way to do it is by stealing the Wicked Witch's sleeping potion!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon. When a meteor comes crashing to Oz, Dorothy and the gang discover that it contains a clue that could lead them to the location of the silver slippers, all the way up on the moon! Enlisting the help of Smith and Tinker, the guys build a space ship that sends them right to the moon. But the Wicked Witch and Wilhelmina are right on their tail with a rocket ship of their own. Dorothy and friends land on the moon and with the help of the moon's residents, the Moonies, they find the clue that may finally lead them to the silver slippers' location. But the Wicked Witch is determined to get it first.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: The Good the Wicked and the Silver Part 1. When they put all the clues for the silver slippers together, Dorothy and friends discover that the answer is through hole in the ground the Quox made. Taking the drill coaster down through the tunnel, they evade the Quox and end up on the bottom side of the world where the Silver Fortress awaits them. They enter the Fortress, evading traps and magical guards and making it all the way to the top of the highest tower where the silver slippers reside. But just as Dorothy can get her hands on the slippers, the Wicked Witch swipes them away, taking them for herself!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: The Good the Wicked and the Silver Part 2. The Wicked Witch has taken the silver slippers and now the entire Silver Fortress and its silver army is under her command! Dorothy and her friends escape the fortress and go back to Oz to try to warn everyone, but the Wicked Witch is right behind them, riding on the back of the Quox. The Witch tells them that Dorothy must surrender the ruby slippers to her before the silver army gets there and marches on Emerald City. But Dorothy and friends refuse to go down without a fight. And they have some volunteers to help: Baron Fernando Von Soozle, the infamous Witch Hunter, is back. But this time he's brought an entire League of Witch Hunters to help them take on the Wicked Witch. Will it be enough? Well, it'll have to do for right now.

In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.desc: Ready Teddy / Swiss Cuckoo / Dream Team / Private Tom. Spike's beloved Teddy bear is accidentally ruined. The Hotel manager vacations in the Swiss Alps. Tom fantasizes himself in a basketball championship where Jerry assists his triumph. Tom's uncle, a strict military mascot, is determined to train Tom to permanently defeat Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hop to It! Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown. Tom sees Princess Toodles and quickly forgets the mission. He competes with Butch in three trials to win over Toodles. Jerry struggles to keep them on track and to help Tom out with the competition.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Entering and Breaking. When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers. At first it seems like they are going to fumble their security jobs but then a burglar proves to be no match for our destructive trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Franken Kitty. Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby he's got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Haunted Mouse. Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house. At first Tom and Jerry think it's just his imagination but discover that the house seems haunted. They find out it's a rat who wanted to chase Tuffy out so he could live there with his family but is ok with sharing the home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom-Foolery. Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. Butch finds out that living Tom's cushy life isn't what it seems when Jerry makes his life difficult and Ginger's doting is humiliating. Tom finds that living off the street is tricky and difficult. They very quickly switch back to the way it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Round Tripped. If an injured Tom hasn't gotten better before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis -- which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom into doing anything but rest; after all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Blinkie Gets Her Groove Back. On the way to Ozma's weekly picnic, Dorothy and friends come upon Blinkie, a cranky old former witch who lost her powers long ago. To everyone's dismay, Dorothy invites Blinkie along. But she ends up loving it! Blinkie is overjoyed at the fun and friendship and is invited back the next week. The Wicked Witch gets a whiff of this and can't believe it! She lost her powers once and she didn't hang out with those goody-goodies. Maybe Blinkie needs help remembering her wicked roots, and her powers back. And the Wicked Witch has found a way to do it so Blinkie betrays her new friends in the process.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Malý zlodej: Predavač Marcel (46) prichytí pri krádeži Mateja (11). Privolaný chlapcov otec Miro (41) si nevie správanie syna vysvetliť a chce škodu uhradiť. Hliadka vedie oboch na stanicu spísať zápisnicu, keď im do cesty vbehne auto s opitým vodičom Mariánom (65), ktorý sa ukáže ako Matejov dedo. Nevďačný vnuk: Jakub (52) upozorní na volanie o pomoc v susednom byte. Hliadka v byte objaví zviazanú Miladu (73). Čin má na svedomí Miladin vnuk Patrik (22), ktorý ju navyše okradol. Jakub (52) si všimne Patrika na zadnom dvore bytovky. Drogy vo fitness: Polícia preveruje obchod s fitness potrebami pre podozrenie z predaja drog. Majiteľ obchodu Tono (32) a predavač Jaro (18) to popierajú. Jaro odchádza na toaletu, kde ho hliadka prichytí ako vysypáva do misy efedrín. Tono tvrdí, že o ničom netušil. Náramok: Účastník nehody Martin (45) obviňuje Kazimíra (50) z jazdy pod vplyvom alkoholu. Polícia objaví na Kazimírovom zápästí diabetický náramok objasňujúci skutočnú príčinu nehody.

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Pomsta za brata: Irena (52) upozorní políciu na zbitého Kamila (47), ktorý doplní, že ho napadol neznámy mladý muž. Hliadka zakrátko nachádza bratov Dávida (19) a Samuela (13). Dávid vysvetľuje, že len chránil mladšieho brata – ukazuje polícii chatovú komunikáciu, v ktorej Kamil zvádzal Samuela a lanáril ho na protislužby. Predavačka: Ilona (68) sa stala terčom podvodnej podomovej predavačky Niny (27). Hliadka predavačku preveruje a označuje jej podnikanie za nelegálne. Nina sa snaží zbaviť viny a upozorňuje na autora celého podvodu Milana (32) čakajúceho neďaleko. Milan sa pokúsi o útek. Falošná bankovka: Majiteľka predajne Anna (38) obviní Jozefa (82) z pokusu o platbu falošnou bankovkou. Jozef ani jeho manželka Irena (82) netušia, odkiaľ sa falošný peniaz vzal. IT Technik: IT technik Miroslav (33) je obvinený z podvodu a zámerného zavírovania počítača v právnickej firme.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (3)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Sidney opustil faru aj Grantchester a odišiel s Violet do Ameriky v ústrety novému životu. Všetkým samozrejme chýba, ale život ide ďalej. Geordie je povolaný do matematického laboratória Cambridgeskej univerzity, kde istý Tim Amery ohlásil vlámanie. Profesor Alex Simms, ktorého žena Jean laboratórium vedie, to však označuje za nezmysel. Bol v laboratóriu celú noc a pracoval. Vzápätí sa ale rúti k zemi, otrávený ortuťou, ktorá sa v laboratóriu bežne používa. Všetko nasvedčuje nešťastnej náhode, Geordie má však podozrenie, že Alex netrávil noc v laboratóriu sám a už vôbec nie prácou. S vyšetrovaním mu pomôže Leonard, ktorý sa zároveň uchádza o vymenovanie stálym farárom v Grantchesteri. Všetko sa ale ešte poriadne skomplikuje.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (4)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Will Davenport bol menovaný novým stálym farárom, jeho záľubu v motorkách a boxe pani Chapmanová neschvaľuje. Mrazivý je aj jej vzťah k Leonardovi, ktorého načapala pri bozku s Danielom. Medzitým na policajnej stanici príde chlapec, celý od cudzej krvi, a odmieta hovoriť. Geordie sa v núdzi obracia na Willa, ten sa ale nechce nechať podľa vzoru Sidneyho zatiahnuť do policajnej práce. Pretože ide o dieťa, nakoniec privolí a vďaka svojej znalosti posunkovej reči zistí, že sa chlapec volá Adam Carter. Jeho rodina sú mennoniti a obviňujú Adama zo smrti matky Miriam, ktorá spadla zo senníka. Geordie musí jej smrť prešetriť aj napriek odporu rodiny a do prípadu je čím ďalej tým hlbšie vťahovaný aj Will, ktorému dusná atmosféra v rodine zrejme niečo pripomína.

programme.title: Sherlock: Ohavná nevesta
programme.sub-title: Detektívny film VB (2016).
programme.desc: Čo ak by sa Doktor John Watson a Sherlock Holmes tentokrát nestretli v modernom Londýne? Čo ak by to bolo vo viktoriánskej ére a po Baker Street by sa premávali parné vlaky, tradičné taxíky a ľudia v cylindroch a frakoch? Vitajte v Sherlockovi v roku 1895! Niektoré veci však ostávajú s istotou rovnaké a to priateľstvo, dobrodružstvo a najmä zo všetkého ... vražda.

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (9/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 9 Jane je v nemocnici, ale aj z lôžka sa zapája do pátrania po vrahovi mumifikovanej ženy, ktorá ležala päť rokov v pivnici svojho domu. Všetko poukazuje na samovraždu, ale pravda môže byť iná ...

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (10/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 10 Muž, ktorému zostáva len niekoľko mesiacov života, žiada policajta, aby obnovil pátranie v prípade podpaľačstva. Zomrela pri ňom jeho žena a sedemročná dcéra a on z neho bol neprávom obvinený ...

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (16/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 16 Kňaz oznámi na polícii, že sa mu nejaký muž priznal k únosu dieťaťa. Detektívka Lilly Rushová rozbieha pátranie v prípade chlapca, ktorý bol nájdený utopený.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (17/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 17 U mŕtvej narkomanky bol nájdený prsteň dávno zavraždenej ženy. Za vraždu bol odsúdený jej manžel. Ten vinu celý čas popiera. Lilly Rushová zisťuje, že všetko bolo komplikovanejšie, ako to navonok vyzeralo.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (17)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2021-2022).
programme.desc: Tím námorného vyšetrovacieho úradu vyšetruje zmiznutie kolegov. Agent Callen sa snaží dozvedieť viac o svojej temnej minulosti.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2021-2022).
programme.desc: Tím Námorného vyšetrovacieho úradu vyšetruje smrť desiatničky, ktorá pracovala na prísne tajnom protiraketovom systéme.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (5)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Na hriechu je báječné, že nám ho Boh vždy rád odpustí, kiež by to ale bolo zakaždým také jednoduché. Atmosféra na fare po odchode pani Chapmanovej hustne, až by sa dala krájať. Potom Willovi zavolá Sally Roperová a tentoraz je to on, kto žiada Geordieho, aby mu pomohol a odprevadil ho na ceste domov. Jeho otec Thomas sa vraj dostal do problémov. Na mieste sa jednak ukáže, že Will pochádza z veľmi bohatých pomerov a tiež, že jeho násilnícky otec zbil záhradníka Eliho Ropera, podľa všetkého nie prvýkrát. Bonvivánsky cynik Thomas tvrdí, že Eliho načapal pri krádeži a tak ho teda potrestal, a to je všetko. Geordie už sa pomaly chystá na odchod, keď je nájdené mŕtve telo jedného z hostí pána domu. Nasledujúce vyšetrovanie vynesie na povrch nejedno škaredé rodinné tajomstvo.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (6)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Je známa vec, že cesta do pekla je dláždená dobrými úmyslami, ľudia sú ale nepoučiteľní. Po pani Chapmanovej opustil po fyzickej konfrontácii s Willom faru aj Leonard a nič mu nie sú platné Willove ospravedlnenia a prosby, aby sa vrátil. Geordie medzitým lamentuje nad pubertálnou dcérou Esme, ktorú odmieta púšťať na tanečné zábavy s mladými chuligánmi. Dvaja takí práve našli za tančiarňou mŕtve telo rovesníka Donalda Clarka, v ktorého peňaženke Geordie na svoje zdesenie objavuje fotografiu Esme. Donaldov triedny učiteľ Pope vypovie, že mŕtvy chlapec mal množstvo disciplinárnych problémov, čo sa mu ale mohlo stať, netuší. Oveľa viac sa Geordie s Willom nedozvedia ani od jeho spolužiakov. Pátrať je ale treba ďalej. Spoločne s prípadom smeruje k rozuzleniu aj nepekná záležitosť s pánom Hobbsom a tiež neurovnané vzťahy na grantchesterskej fare.

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (11/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 11 V Bostone vládne neznesiteľné teplo a Jane s Maurou sa zaoberajú prípadom vraždy muža nájdeného vo vani so zvyškami ľadu. Ako sa ukáže, pred niekoľkými rokmi prišiel záhadným spôsobom k veľkým peniazom.

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (12/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 12 Vražda dievčaťa, ktoré je nájdené udusené na posteli vo svojom byte v Bostone, pripomína inú, ktorá sa pred časom udiala v Plymouthe. Tamojší prokurátor odsúdil vraha a poslal ho do väzenia. Teraz sa ale sám stáva podozrivým.

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (1)
programme.sub-title: Zlomené srdce. Krimiseriál ČR (2018-2019).
programme.desc: Začalo to všetko ako sen a zdalo sa, že všetko ide perfektne. Ale pri večeri pri sviečkach oznámi Pavel Borka Márii Horáčkovej, že s ňou nemôže mať žiadny vzťah. Matke, ktorá sama vychováva päťročnú dcéru, sa zrúti svet. Ďalšie ráno je Pavel nájdený mŕtvy vo svojom byte, zabitý fľašou Brandy.

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (2)
programme.sub-title: Šťastná rodinka. Krimiseriál ČR (2018-2019).
programme.desc: Dve sestry skolabujú v bazéne. Jedna z nich zomrie. Príčinou bola otrava ketamínom, anestetikom s psychadelickými účinkami. Išlo o nešťastnú náhodu? Alebo o vraždu?

programme.title: S chladom zabijaka (5)
programme.sub-title: Seriál USA (2018).
programme.desc: Mladý pár sa v snahe udržať si manželstvo svieže rozhodne pre život plný sexuálnych hier a swingers párty. Keď však skupinový sex vedie k vražde, vyšetrovatelia sa snažia zistiť a dokázať, kto jedného z jeho účastníkov zabil. Známy raper a herec Ice-T sprevádza seriálom o šokujúcich skutočných zločinoch. Dramatické rekonštrukcie udalostí vnesú do prípadov nové svetlo. Každá epizóda skúma jeden kriminálny prípad, odhalí nečakané zvraty a ukáže, ako chamtivosť, vášeň či iné motívy viedli až k vražde. V seriáli nie je núdza o archívne zábery a rozhovory s detektívmi či ľuďmi, ktorých tieto zločiny zasiahli a obrátili ich životy naruby.

programme.title: S chladom zabijaka (6)
programme.sub-title: Seriál USA (2018).
programme.desc: Po živote plnom ťažkej práce sa jeden šťastný dôchodca teší na pokojné dni. Ale milenecká hádka a motív rýchleho finančného zárobku vedú k vražde. Hollywood je šokovaný, keď sa pod jeho najznámejšou pamiatkou nájde telo bez života. Známy raper a herec Ice-T sprevádza seriálom o šokujúcich skutočných zločinoch. Dramatické rekonštrukcie udalostí vnesú do prípadov nové svetlo. Každá epizóda skúma jeden kriminálny prípad, odhalí nečakané zvraty a ukáže, ako chamtivosť, vášeň či iné motívy viedli až k vražde. V seriáli nie je núdza o archívne zábery a rozhovory s detektívmi či ľuďmi, ktorých tieto zločiny zasiahli a obrátili ich životy naruby.

Pátrať je ale treba ďalej. Spoločne s prípadom smeruje k rozuzleniu aj nepekná záležitosť s pánom Hobbsom a tiež neurovnané vzťahy na grantchesterskej fare.

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (1)
programme.sub-title: Zlomené srdce. Krimiseriál ČR (2018-2019).
programme.desc: Začalo to všetko ako sen a zdalo sa, že všetko ide perfektne. Ale pri večeri pri sviečkach oznámi Pavel Borka Márii Horáčkovej, že s ňou nemôže mať žiadny vzťah. Matke, ktorá sama vychováva päťročnú dcéru, sa zrúti svet. Ďalšie ráno je Pavel nájdený mŕtvy vo svojom byte, zabitý fľašou Brandy.

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (2)
programme.sub-title: Šťastná rodinka. Krimiseriál ČR (2018-2019).
programme.desc: Dve sestry skolabujú v bazéne. Jedna z nich zomrie. Príčinou bola otrava ketamínom, anestetikom s psychadelickými účinkami. Išlo o nešťastnú náhodu? Alebo o vraždu?

programme.title: Mesto tieňov
programme.desc: Vyšetrovatelia nájdu pri bezdomoveckom útulku utýraného starého muža. Vyšetrovatelia majú podozrenie, že za vraždou stojí nejaká organizovaná skupina. Ľudia z bezdomoveckej komunity majú strach. Tomáš Benkovský obeť pozná a má osobné dôvody, aby sa v prípade angažoval. Pokúsi sa dostať medzi bezdomovcov a pri tom záhadne zmizne...

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Kleptomanka v nákupnom centre: Predavač Noro (21) privolá políciu na pani Ivetu (38), ktorú upodozrieva z krádeže detských vecí. Polícia ju odvedie k svojmu autu, kde pri prehľadávaní nájde jej dvojitú sukňu plnú kradnutého tovaru. Do situácie zasiahne jej muž a vedúci obchodného centra Jakub (49). Iveta kradne detské veci, lebo s ňou Jakub nikdy nechcel mať deti, čo u nej viedlo k psychickým problémom – trpí kleptomániou. Bezprizorné dieťa: Polícia je privolaná do ZOO, kde sa učiteľke Agáte (31) stratilo dieťa Klaudia (7). Na ihrisku nájdu len zakrvavenú mikinu a všetko sa vyhrotí, keď na miesto dorazí jej matka Natália (34). Po zúfalom hľadaní Klaudia vyjde zo svojej skrýše a povie, že ju učiteľka neprávom zbila a preto sa skryla. Útek z miesta: Kaderníčka Tereza (37) privolá políciu na svojho suseda Ivana (47), ktorý jej mal nabúrať auto a utiecť. Pri pátraní polícia zistí, že auto šoféroval jeho syn Patrik (18). Viezol do nemocnice svoju starú mamu, ktorá odpadla.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (1)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Doba sa mení a Geordiemu sa cnie po starých dobrých časoch, aj keď ich idylickosť bola viac zbožným prianím ako realitou. Za všetko vraj môže Elvis a to jeho nehanebné krútenie zadkom, inšpektorovi ale skôr vadí, že si Cathy našla prácu. Sidneyho zase pomaly začína ubíjať rutina farskej prevádzky, pleseň v sakristii a podobne závažné problémy. Do Grantchesteru prichádza na pozvanie profesora Barkleyho zo zámoria reverend Nathaniel Todd, bojovník za práva čiernych Američanov, ktorý má v kostole, napriek nevôli početného davu, predniesť reč. Prejav naruší študent Gregory Jones a v vzniknutej tlačenici ktosi prebodne Toddovho syna Charlesa. Rozbieha sa vyšetrovanie, s ktorým Sidneymu a Geordiemu pomôže mladý kaplán Will Davenport. Že by začiatok nového krásneho priateľstva?

programme.title: Grantchester IV (2)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Sidney po rozlúčení s Violet pije viac ako predtým. Ráno sa budí za neznesiteľného hluku vysávania pani Chapmanovej, v hlave má len útržky minulej noci. Medzitým polícia v pochybnej štvrti Kite nachádza zbitú mladú ženu. Keď sa jej Geordie pýta, či by chcela s niekým hovoriť, odpovie, že so Sidneym Chambersom a čoskoro na to umiera. Pátranie Geordieho so Sidneym dovedie k jej spolubývajúcim, ktoré svorne tvrdia, že sú krajčírky, pravda bude ale najskôr oveľa prozaickejšia. A podľa všetkého na nich zarába niekto vysoko postavený. Sidney by si mal spomenúť, odkiaľ sa s mŕtvou poznal, pôsobí ale zvláštne rezignovane a zveruje sa Geordiemu, že sa bojí, že sa odcudzill sám sebe. Aj jemu ale svitne na konci príbehu nová nádej.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (11/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 11 Lilly Rushovú vyhľadá žena, ktorá žiada otvoriť prípad samovraždy jej brata, ktorej údajne predchádzalo mužovo členstvo v miestnej sekte. Nové dôkazy však preukážu, že mohlo ísť o vraždu!

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (12/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 12 Muž, ktorý sa živil ako profesionálny rozhodca v boxe, žiada na smrteľnej posteli o odpustenie za smrť mladého boxera. Detektívka Lilly Rushová otvára prípad mladíka, ktorý chcel žiť naplno...

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (13/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 13 Lilly Rushová so svojim tímom vyšetruje vraždu malého černošského dievčaťa, ktoré zomrelo pred rokmi pri streľbe na miestnom volejbalovom ihrisku. A teraz sa vražedná zbraň dostala do rúk polície. Sympatická detektívka pátra po všetkých, ktorí mali so zbraňou niečo spoločné.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (14/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 14 Polícia zadržala muža, ktorý sa po rokoch vrátil z Kanady a je podozrivý, že zabil dievča, s ktorým chodil. Detektívka Lilly Rushová a jej tím začnú odkrývať vtedajšie vzťahy medzi priateľmi zavraždenej.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (15/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 15 Lilly Rushová prešetruje zvláštnu nehodu na železnici, pri ktorej vlak zrazil mentálne retardovaného chlapca.

programme.title: Sherlock: Ohavná nevesta
programme.sub-title: Detektívny film VB (2016).
programme.desc: Čo ak by sa Doktor John Watson a Sherlock Holmes tentokrát nestretli v modernom Londýne? Čo ak by to bolo vo viktoriánskej ére a po Baker Street by sa premávali parné vlaky, tradičné taxíky a ľudia v cylindroch a frakoch? Vitajte v Sherlockovi v roku 1895! Niektoré veci však ostávajú s istotou rovnaké a to priateľstvo, dobrodružstvo a najmä zo všetkého ... vražda.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (3)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Sidney opustil faru aj Grantchester a odišiel s Violet do Ameriky v ústrety novému životu. Všetkým samozrejme chýba, ale život ide ďalej. Geordie je povolaný do matematického laboratória Cambridgeskej univerzity, kde istý Tim Amery ohlásil vlámanie. Profesor Alex Simms, ktorého žena Jean laboratórium vedie, to však označuje za nezmysel. Bol v laboratóriu celú noc a pracoval. Vzápätí sa ale rúti k zemi, otrávený ortuťou, ktorá sa v laboratóriu bežne používa. Všetko nasvedčuje nešťastnej náhode, Geordie má však podozrenie, že Alex netrávil noc v laboratóriu sám a už vôbec nie prácou. S vyšetrovaním mu pomôže Leonard, ktorý sa zároveň uchádza o vymenovanie stálym farárom v Grantchesteri. Všetko sa ale ešte poriadne skomplikuje.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (4)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Will Davenport bol menovaný novým stálym farárom, jeho záľubu v motorkách a boxe pani Chapmanová neschvaľuje. Mrazivý je aj jej vzťah k Leonardovi, ktorého načapala pri bozku s Danielom. Medzitým na policajnej stanici príde chlapec, celý od cudzej krvi, a odmieta hovoriť. Geordie sa v núdzi obracia na Willa, ten sa ale nechce nechať podľa vzoru Sidneyho zatiahnuť do policajnej práce. Pretože ide o dieťa, nakoniec privolí a vďaka svojej znalosti posunkovej reči zistí, že sa chlapec volá Adam Carter. Jeho rodina sú mennoniti a obviňujú Adama zo smrti matky Miriam, ktorá spadla zo senníka. Geordie musí jej smrť prešetriť aj napriek odporu rodiny a do prípadu je čím ďalej tým hlbšie vťahovaný aj Will, ktorému dusná atmosféra v rodine zrejme niečo pripomína.

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (9/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 9 Jane je v nemocnici, ale aj z lôžka sa zapája do pátrania po vrahovi mumifikovanej ženy, ktorá ležala päť rokov v pivnici svojho domu. Všetko poukazuje na samovraždu, ale pravda môže byť iná ...

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (10/18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2014-2015).
programme.desc: 10 Muž, ktorému zostáva len niekoľko mesiacov života, žiada policajta, aby obnovil pátranie v prípade podpaľačstva. Zomrela pri ňom jeho žena a sedemročná dcéra a on z neho bol neprávom obvinený ...

programme.title: Špecialisti III (16)
programme.sub-title: Hvar. Krimiseriál ČR (2018).
programme.desc: Major Vondráček je požiadaný svojou matkou, aby vyšetril možné úkladné vraždy v domove seniorov Zátoka pokoja. Vondráček svojej matke neverí, ale nakoniec sa nechá prehovoriť a pristúpi na neformálne vyšetrovanie. Naozaj sa niekoľko dôchodcov presťahovalo za slnkom do chorvátskeho Hvaru alebo sa ich niekto zbavil?

programme.title: Špecialisti III (17)
programme.sub-title: Náklad smrti. Krimiseriál ČR (2018).
programme.desc: Díler heroínu Bláha je zavraždený kuriozným bombovým atentátom, kedy trhavinu nesie diaľkovo riadený model vrtuľníka. Pátranie špecialistov zavedie medzi Bláhových konkurentov aj medzi pražských modelárov. Až keď tieto dva svety prepoja, až potom majú nádej odhaliť páchateľa.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (17)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2021-2022).
programme.desc: Tím námorného vyšetrovacieho úradu vyšetruje zmiznutie kolegov. Agent Callen sa snaží dozvedieť viac o svojej temnej minulosti.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (18)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2021-2022).
programme.desc: Tím Námorného vyšetrovacieho úradu vyšetruje smrť desiatničky, ktorá pracovala na prísne tajnom protiraketovom systéme.

programme.title: Grantchester IV (3)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál VB (2019).
programme.desc: Sidney opustil faru aj Grantchester a odišiel s Violet do Ameriky v ústrety novému životu. Všetkým samozrejme chýba, ale život ide ďalej. Geordie je povolaný do matematického laboratória Cambridgeskej univerzity, kde istý Tim Amery ohlásil vlámanie. programme.sub-title: Neuveriteľné udalosti zachytené na núdzovej linke
programme.desc: Neuveriteľné udalosti zachytené na núdzovej linke

programme.title: Mesto tieňov
programme.sub-title: Chladnokrvne. Seriál SR (2008). Kriminálny seriál inšpirovaný skutočnými príbehmi
programme.desc: V mŕtvom ramene sa nájde rozložená mŕtvola zaťažená železom a kováčskou nákovou. Identita zavraždeného prinesie množstvo otázok a takmer žiadnu odpoveď. Napokon sa ukáže, že za chladnokrvným zločinom sa skrýva bezcitný a despotický vrah. Navyše polícia pri razii na nepovolenej technopárty zatkne dcéru Ivana Tomečka. Ivan sa obáva, že jeho dcéra berie drogy.

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Muž podozrivý, že je pedofil: Helena videla suseda ako domov vzal cudzie malé dievčatko, podozrieva ho, že je pedofil. Dievčatko bolo vystrašené. Ukáže sa, že sused nie je úchyl, ale ujal sa malého zmäteného dievčatka na ulici. Dievčatko v šoku vybehlo z domu hľadať pomoc pre jej mamu ležiacu v bezvedomí v ich dome. Stratené dieťa: 8-ročné dievčatko zmizlo zo svojej izby. Matka je zúfalá a nahnevaná. Podozrieva svojho exmanžela, že dcéru uniesol. Ukáže sa, že dievčatko vzala stará mama na výlet, aby sa rodičia spamätali a prestali dcéru používať ako rukojemníčku vo svojich sporoch. Ukradnutý pes: Z chovnej stanice sa stratil pes, priateľka majiteľa bola prepadnutá. Podozrievajú konkurenciu, ale ukáže sa, že bývalá manželka majiteľa chce psa pre svoju dcéru. Psa vychovala, navyše žiarli na novú ženu a chcela si vynútiť pozornosť bývalého muža.

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Únos dieťaťa: Polícia zastaví vodiča Siavasha(41) kvôli rýchlej jazde. Na zadnom sedadle je uložené dieťa (4), ktoré má podľa slov vodiča vysoké horúčky a vezie ho do nemocnice. Na mieste činu dobrzdí ďalšie auto. Lakomec: Roman (34) podozrieva domovníka Olega (56) z podvodov pri odpisovaní energii. Hliadka je privolaná kvôli ich hlasnej hádke. Facelift: Helena (52) chce podať na kozmetičku Tinu (37) trestné oznámenie za ublíženie na zdraví. Tá sa bráni, že ide o alergickú reakciu na peeling. Situáciu prichádza overiť Tinin manžel Pavol (43). Vozičkár: Bezdomovec Stano (43) sa stane obeťou útoku. Útočníci mu tiež prepichli gumy na invalidnom vozíku. Svedkyňa Patrícia (51) pomôže identifikovať hliadke vinníkov Lukáša (14) a Dávida (15).

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Podozrivý muž na školskom dvore: Alojz (41) je rodičmi na školskom dvore obvinený z pedofílie. Alojz to popiera a ukazuje im fotky detí, ktoré spravil. Najčastejšie je medzi nimi dievča Hanka (8). Polícia zistí, že kedysi niečo mal s jej matkou Ivetou (34) a Hanka je možno jeho dcéra. Krádež auta – opustené dieťa: Kuchár Milan (34) a chyžná Petra (31) ukradnú osobné auto a chcú na ňom utiecť do zahraničia. V aute však nájdu malé dieťa, čo spustí medzi nimi hádku. Polícia nájde matku dieťaťa Máriu (29) a zistí, že ho celú noc nechala v aute. Dieťa prevezme sociálna pracovníčka pani Kováčiková (49). Domáce násilie: Pri hotelovom bazéne sa strhla šarvátka medzi mužmi Oskarom (41) a Karolom (28). Oskarova žena Hana (34) tvrdí, že bitku začal Karol a takmer jej muža zabil. Neskôr však vyjde na povrch, že príčinou konfliktu bol jej muž Oskar, ktorý ju týra.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (10/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 10 Manželka zavraždeného zástupcu štátneho žalobcu žiada o prešetrenie prípadu a očistenie dobrého mena obete. Stále totiž kolujú klebety, že príčinou vraždy bola sprenevera. Detektívka Lilly Rushová nájde pri vyšetrovaní nové dôkazy...

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (11/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 11 Lilly Rushovú vyhľadá žena, ktorá žiada otvoriť prípad samovraždy jej brata, ktorej údajne predchádzalo mužovo členstvo v miestnej sekte. Nové dôkazy však preukážu, že mohlo ísť o vraždu!

programme.title: Kosti XII (2)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2017).
programme.desc: Keď nájdu mŕtve telo muža, ktorý sa podieľal na vývoji robotiky a umelej inteligencie, vedecký tím zisťuje, že jeho vlastný robot mohol byť naprogramovaný tak, aby ho zabil. Doktorka Brennanová sa chystá osláviť svoje 40. narodeniny a pri tejto príležitosti pre svojich blízkych aj všetkých kolegov z Jeffersonského ústavu chystá pripravuje špeciálne prekvapenie.

programme.title: Kosti XII (3)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2017).
programme.desc: Nález tela starého muža na skládke s kyselinou odštartuje prípad, ktorého stopy zavedú vyšetrovateľov do domova dôchodcov. Kým vedecký tím rieši zločin zo spoločnosti seniorov, jeho členovia sa zaoberajú svojimi súčasnými problémami a v jeffersonskom laboratóriu dominujú rozhovory o manželstve a deťoch.

programme.title: Mentalista III (24/24)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2010-2011).
programme.desc: III. 24 Patrick vymyslí plán, ako očistiť svoje meno a odhaliť spolupracovníka Reda Johna z CBI. Od La Rocheho vyláka zoznam ľudí, ktorých podozrievali zo spolupráce s Redom Johnom. Týmto ďalším štyrom ľuďom potom prezradí, kde by sa mala Hightowerová nachádzať. Keď sa nájomná vrahyňa dostaví na miesto, zdá sa, že spolupracovníkom Reda Johna je sám šéf CBI...

programme.title: Mentalista IV (1/24)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2011-2012).
programme.desc: IV. 1 Patrick Jane je vo väzbe za vraždu Reda Johna. Ukáže sa ale, že mŕtvy muž je Timothy Carter, nevinný človek bez záznamu v trestnom registri. Tím sa snaží dokázať, že naozaj bol Red John a Jane zháňa vo väzení milión dolárov na kauciu. Napokon sa podarí dokázať, že Timothy Carter nebol až taký nevinný...

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Krádež v obchode: Manželia Rado (32) a Paula (28) sú obvinení vedúcim obchodu s elektronikou pánom Polákom (47), že niečo v jeho predajni ukradli. Obaja sa bránia, že nič neukradli, polícia sa však rozhodne preskúmať kočík s ich dieťaťom, či sa v ňom nejaký kradnutý tovar nenachádza. Agresívny revízor: Polícia musí riešiť hádku medzi revízorom Rudolfom (52) a študentkou Martinou (23), ktorá tvrdí, že jej dal neprávom pokutu. Na jej strane stojí aj dôchodkyňa Eleonóra (61), ktorá tiež tvrdí, že dostala neprávom pokutu. Podarí sa polícii zistiť, kto hovorí pravdu a kto klame? Alkoholická matka: Mladá mamička Táňa (29) pod vplyvom alkoholu bije svojho syna Jurka (11). Jej matka Zuzana (59) sa ju snaží zastaviť, ale sama sa stane terčom jej útoku. Polícia zistí, že Táňa dlhodobo zanedbáva Jurka, a ten musí ísť bývať k babke Zuzane.

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Podozrivý muž na školskom dvore: Alojz (41) je rodičmi na školskom dvore obvinený z pedofílie. Alojz to popiera a ukazuje im fotky detí, ktoré spravil. Najčastejšie je medzi nimi dievča Hanka (8). Polícia zistí, že kedysi niečo mal s jej matkou Ivetou (34) a Hanka je možno jeho dcéra. Krádež auta – opustené dieťa: Kuchár Milan (34) a chyžná Petra (31) ukradnú osobné auto a chcú na ňom utiecť do zahraničia. V aute však nájdu malé dieťa, čo spustí medzi nimi hádku. Polícia nájde matku dieťaťa Máriu (29) a zistí, že ho celú noc nechala v aute. Dieťa prevezme sociálna pracovníčka pani Kováčiková (49). Domáce násilie: Pri hotelovom bazéne sa strhla šarvátka medzi mužmi Oskarom (41) a Karolom (28). Oskarova žena Hana (34) tvrdí, že bitku začal Karol a takmer jej muža zabil. Neskôr však vyjde na povrch, že príčinou konfliktu bol jej muž Oskar, ktorý ju týra.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Kosti XII (4)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2017).
programme.desc: Obeťou najnovšej vraždy je niekto, koho Booth a Brennanová v minulosti dobre poznali. Agent James Aubrey čelí morálnej dileme, keď zistí, že jeho otec sa vrátil a s ním aj jeho kontroverzná minulosť.

programme.title: Kosti XII (5)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2017).
programme.desc: Agent Booth a vedecký tím z jeffersonského ústavu vyšetrujú vraždu študenta jednej z najprestížnejších amerických univerzít, ktorého našli z rozbitou lebkou. Premiant elitnej školy pôsobil ako súkromný učiteľ a doučoval menej nadaných ale privilegovaných žiakov z bohatých rodín. Medzi podozrivými z vraždy mladého učiteľa je nielen jeho bývalý spolubývajúci Matt Bogdan, vytrvalý súper s trestným záznamom, ale aj nespokojní študenti, ich rozhnevaní rodičia, a tiež matky študentov, ktoré s učiteľom podvádzali svojich manželov.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (16/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 16 Kňaz oznámi na polícii, že sa mu nejaký muž priznal k únosu dieťaťa. Detektívka Lilly Rushová rozbieha pátranie v prípade chlapca, ktorý bol nájdený utopený.

programme.title: Odložený prípad II (17/23)
programme.sub-title: Detektívny seriál USA (2004-2005).
programme.desc: II. 17 U mŕtvej narkomanky bol nájdený prsteň dávno zavraždenej ženy. Za vraždu bol odsúdený jej manžel. Ten vinu celý čas popiera. Lilly Rushová zisťuje, že všetko bolo komplikovanejšie, ako to navonok vyzeralo.

programme.title: Mentalista IV (2/24)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2011-2012).
programme.desc: IV. 2 Tím je kvôli prípadu Reda Johna rozpustený. Lisbonová je vyšetrovaná, Rigsby dostal inú prácu, Van Peltová čaká na zaradenie a Cho s Patrickom Janeom sú pridelení k novému tímu Raya Haffnera. Tím dostane prípad zavraždeného trénera z telocvične. A nebol by to Patrick Jane, keby nepoštval členov nového tímu proti sebe.

programme.title: Mentalista IV (3/24)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2011-2012).
programme.desc: IV. 3 Z autobusovej zastávky je unesený deväťročný chlapec Conner Flint. Jeho matka je bývalou klientkou Patricka Jana a stále verí na jeho jasnovidecké schopnosti. Jej nový senzibil Nate Glass ju presvedčí, že videl záblesk ohľadom Connera a že s ním komunikoval. Ich tipom na únoscu je muž, ktorý uniesol už dvoch chlapcov - elektrikár Brady Walton. Po zásahu v jeho dome sa ale ukáže, že on to nebol. Ďalším podozrivým sa stáva jeho matka s finančnými ťažkosťami.

programme.title: Sherlock: Ohavná nevesta
programme.sub-title: Detektívny film VB (2016).
programme.desc: Čo ak by sa Doktor John Watson a Sherlock Holmes tentokrát nestretli v modernom Londýne? Čo ak by to bolo vo viktoriánskej ére a po Baker Street by sa premávali parné vlaky, tradičné taxíky a ľudia v cylindroch a frakoch? Vitajte v Sherlockovi v roku 1895! Niektoré veci však ostávajú s istotou rovnaké a to priateľstvo, dobrodružstvo a najmä zo všetkého ... vražda.

programme.title: Kosti XII (4)
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál USA (2017).
programme.desc: Obeťou najnovšej vraždy je niekto, koho Booth a Brennanová v minulosti dobre poznali. Agent James Aubrey čelí morálnej dileme, keď zistí, že jeho otec sa vrátil a s ním aj jeho kontroverzná minulosť.
